name: Anonymous Messages
description:
You wake up lost in a bizarre looking forest.
You can't remember anything…

Equipped only with a flash light and cassette player, you try to find anything that refresh your memory.
Your heart beat start to raise slowly, then you find first hope with the first cassette tape that contain messages from anonymous person!

There are 6 cassette tapes, each one with a weird Anonymous Message, these tapes help you to recover some parts of your memory and calm your heart beat a little bit! but the forest will turn against you the more you stay in it!

Beware the Trees are Watching You O_O

Game Features and Gameplay:
* Psychological horror - A sense of insanity and memory loss can turn anything to a nightmare
* Interesting atmospheric environment - Bizarre looking forest gives you a true lost feeling
* Interesting survival mechanic - Your heart beat is your friend and enemy at the same time.
* Localization: English & Arabic Subtitles.

---------------------------------
This is a port of the original game developed & published in 2013
